steps.action: Apply to all devices, when we have at least 2 versions of release candidate. (version number: v1 < v2)
Press “Win + E” keys, open File Explorer, go to the folder where “cmdextension.v1.msi and cmdextension.v2.msi” locates
In file explorer, click on “File -> Open Windows PowerShell -> Open Windows PowerShell as administrator”
Wait 1 minute, and run command msiexec /i cmdextension.v1.msi /qn+
steps.expected: The prompt window should pop up: Title is “Microsoft Cloud Managed Desktop Extension”, and Message is “Microsoft Cloud Managed Desktop Extension Setup failed.”

steps.action: Open “Control Panel -> Programs -> Uninstall a program”
steps.expected: Verify “Microsoft Cloud Managed Desktop Extension” is present in the list of installed programs, and its Version is [v2-version-number].

steps.action:
Test Cleanup:


In the same powershell window as “Step 3”, run command: msiexec /x cmdextension.v2.msi
